Name: Razor-Sharp I
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%.

Name: Razor-Sharp II
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30%.

Name: Razor-Sharp III
Description: Basic Attack's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 45%.

Name: Overclock I
Description: Skill's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%.

Name: Overclock II
Description: Skill's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20%.

Name: Overclock III
Description: Skill's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30%.

Name: Heat Cutting I
Description: Melee attacks reduce the target's DEF by 10%.

Name: Heat Cutting II
Description: Melee attacks reduce the target's DEF by 20%.

Name: Heat Cutting III
Description: Melee attacks reduce the target's DEF by 30%.

Name: Adaptive Structure
Description: Attacks lower the target's Extra DMG Bonus by 40% for 5s.

Name: Metal Fatigue
Description: When dealing DMG, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30% for 10s. 15s cooldown.

Name: Solidity
Description: Attacks have a 20% chance to grant a shield equal to 15% of maximum HP for 5s. 8s cooldown.

Name: Energy Spike
Description: Attacks have a 10% chance to stun the target for 1.5s and deal 1000% Physical DMG. 25s cooldown.

Name: Electromagnetic Wave
Description: Gain 10s Super Armor and 20% Extra DMG Bonus after casting a Signature Move.

Name: Leadership Chain I
Description: After summoning a QTE, unleashes a shockwave within 6m that deals 300% Physical DMG.

Name: Leadership Chain II
Description: After summoning a QTE, unleashes a shockwave within 6m that deals 450% Physical DMG.

Name: Leadership Chain III
Description: After summoning a QTE, unleashes a shockwave within 6m that deals 600% Physical DMG.

Name: Chain Optimization I
Description: QTE cooldown decreases by 1s.

Name: Chain Optimization II
Description: QTE cooldown decreases by 2s.

Name: Chain Optimization III
Description: QTE cooldown decreases by 3s

Name: All-Out Attack
Description: Triggering a QTE by a 3-Ping will trigger the other two members' QTE. 15s cooldown.

Name: Mobility Up I
Description: Limit of Dodge Gauge increases by 400.

Name: Mobility Up II
Description: Limit of Dodge Gauge increases by 700.

Name: Mobility Up III
Description: Limit of Dodge Gauge increases by 1000.

Name: Processor Adjustment
Description: Gains 1 Signal Orb when entering Matrix.

Name: Auxiliary Add-On
Description: For every Orb pinged, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3% for 5s. Stacks up to 10 times.

Name: Superior Processing I
Description: When entering Matrix, unleashes a shockwave within 12m that deals 600% Physical DMG.

Name: Superior Processing II
Description: When entering Matrix, unleashes a shockwave within 12m that deals 900% Physical DMG.

Name: Superior Processing III
Description: When entering Matrix, unleashes a shockwave within 12m that deals 1200% Physical DMG.

Name: Processing Suppression
Description: Becomes immune to any DMG when in Matrix.

Name: Feedback Chain
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%/20%/30% for 5s when Combo is greater than 40/80/120.

Name: Tactic Upgrade
Description: DMG dealt increases by 15%. DMG taken decreases by 15%.

Name: Desperation
Description: For each Construct defeated, other members' Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30%.

Name: Well-Prepared
Description: All members have full Energy at the start of battle.

Name: Battlefield Analysis
Description: After landing a critical hit, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 3% for 5s. Stacks up to 10 times.

Name: Signal Orb I
Description: 100% chance to drop 1 random Signal Orb after an enemy is defeated.

Name: Signal Orb II
Description: 100% chance to drop 2 random Signal Orbs after an enemy is defeated.

Name: Signal Orb III
Description: 100% chance to drop 3 random Signal Orbs after an enemy is defeated.

Name: Signal Amplifier
Description: Gives 3 random Signal Orbs of the same color to the character in battle every 10s.

Name: Awaken
Description: Gives an extra random Signal Orb when entering battle for the first time.

Name: Maintenance
Description: Gives 20 bonus Energy each time when the character is deployed.

Name: Resistance Reduction I
Description: Reduces the target's Elemental Resistance by 10% upon dealing DMG.

Name: Resistance Reduction II
Description: Reduces the target's Elemental Resistance by 20% upon dealing DMG.

Name: Resistance Reduction III
Description: Reduces the target's Elemental Resistance by 30% upon dealing DMG.

Name: Endless Vigor
Description: Healing effect increases by 15%. Increases the Extra Damage Bonus of targets healed by 20% for 5s.

Name: Critical Blow
Description: Characters in combat gain 8% CRIT Rate every second. After landing a critical hit, gain "Guaranteed Critical" effect for 2s. 15s cooldown.

Name: Quick Charge
Description: Gains 3 Energy every second.

Name: Power Booster
Description: HP and ATK increase by 5%.

Name: Strong Arm
Description: Physical DMG increases 30%.

Name: Kelvin
Description: Ice DMG increases by 30%.

Name: joule
Description: Fire DMG increases by 30%.

Name: Ampere
Description: Lightning DMG increases by 30%.

Name: Sievert
Description: Dark DMG increases by 30%.

Name: Gold Plating
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 8%

Name: Reactive Armor
Description: Deployed Constructs' Extra DMG Reduction increases by 30%.

Name: Tactical team
Description: Deployed Constructs' ATK increases by 10%.

Name: Lucky Dog
Description: Gains 5% more Support Points from battles

Name: Lucky Dog
Description: Gains 10% more Support Points from battles

Name: Lucky Dog
Description: Gains 15% more Support Points from battles

Name: Lucky Dog
Description: Gains 20% more Support Points from battles

Name: Lucky Dog
Description: Gains 25% more Support Points from battles

Name: Authority Up I
Description: Get a 5% discount in the Tactical Supply Shop

Name: Authority Up II
Description: Get a 10% discount in the Tactical Supply Shop

Name: Authority Up
Description: Get a 15% discount in the Tactical Supply Shop

Description: Get a 20% discount in the Tactical Supply Shop

Name: Authority Up
Description: Get a 25% discount in the Tactical Supply Shop

Name: Authority Up
Description: Get a 30% discount in the Tactical Supply Shop

Name: Shared Leadership
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of all team members increases by 15%.

Name: Field Maintenance
Description: Heals the team for 10% HP lost every 6s.

Name: False Target
Description: Construct's Extra DMG Reduction increases by 15%.

Name: Omnipotent
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of all team members increases by 24%.

Name: Mechanical Learning
Description: Dodge increases Movement Speed by 10% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

Name: Signal Tracker
Description: Basic Attacks generate 1 more Energy.

Name: Energy Recycling
Description: 1-Ping/2-Ping/3-Ping generates 1/2/3 additional Energy.

Name: Maintenance Theory
Description: Healing effect increases by 10%

Name: Icy Blade I
Description: Basic Attacks deal additional Ice DMG equal to 50% of self ATK.

Name: Icy Blade II
Description: Basic Attacks deal additional Ice DMG equal to 70% of self ATK.

Name: Icy Blade III
Description: Basic Attacks deal additional Ice DMG equal to 100% of self ATK.

Name: Dark Blade I
Description: Basic Attacks deal additional Dark DMG equal to 50% of self ATK.

Name: Dark Blade II
Description: Basic Attacks deal additional Dark DMG equal to 70% of self ATK.

Name: Dark Blade III
Description: Basic Attacks deal additional Dark DMG equal to 100% of self ATK.

Name: Arctic I
Description: Ice DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Arctic II
Description: Ice DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Arctic III
Description: Ice DMG increases by 30%.

Name: Shadow I
Description: Dark DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Shadow II
Description: Dark DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Shadow III
Description: Dark DMG increases by 30%.

Name: Ice Shield I
Description: Dealing Ice DMG has a 20% chance to grant self an ice shield equal to 50% of max HP. Immune to any attacks when the shield exists. 15s cooldown.

Name: Ice Shield II
Description: Dealing Ice DMG has a 20% chance to grant self an ice shield equal to 75% of max HP. Immune to any attacks when the shield exists. 15s cooldown.

Name: Ice Shield III
Description: Dealing Ice DMG has a 20% chance to grant self an ice shield equal to 100% of max HP. Immune to any attacks when the shield exists. 15s cooldown.

Name: Freeze I
Description: Ice DMG has a 10% chance to freeze the enemy for 3s. It can only be triggered once per 13s.

Name: Freeze II
Description: Ice DMG has a 20% chance to freeze the enemy for 3s. It can only be triggered once per 13s.

Name: Freeze III
Description: Ice DMG has a 30% chance to freeze the enemy for 3s. It can only be triggered once per 13s.

Name: Dark Field I
Description: All enemies within 4.5m from the Construct deployed receive Dark DMG equal to 5% of the Construct's ATK once per 3s.

Name: Dark Field II
Description: All enemies within 4.5m from the Construct deployed receive Dark DMG equal to 10% of the Construct's ATK once per 3s.

Name: Dark Field III
Description: All enemies within 4.5m from the Construct deployed receive Dark DMG equal to 15% of the Construct's ATK once per 3s.

Name: Strong Arm
Description: Deployed members' HP increases by 40%

Name: Shield I
Description: Gain a shield equal to 10% HP at the start of battle.

Name: Shield II
Description: Gain a shield equal to 15% HP at the start of battle.

Name: Shield III
Description: Gain a shield equal to 20% HP at the start of battle.

Name: Fight Back I
Description: Has a 40% chance to gain a shield equal to 5% HP for 5s when taking DMG.

Name: Fight Back II
Description: Has a 50% chance to gain a shield equal to 10% HP for 5s when taking DMG.

Name: Fight Back III
Description: Has a 60% chance to gain a shield equal to 15% HP for 5s when taking DMG.

Name: Assist
Description: Michael will help you in battle. You can purchase bonuses from Tactical Supply to enhance Michael's strength.

Name: Ultra: Thunder Wrath I
Description: Pining a Blue Orb within 3s after a 3-Ping can increase the DMG of next 6 Basic Attacks by <color=#FF3300FF>300%</color>/600%/900%.

Name: Ultra: Thunder Wrath II
Description: Pining a Blue Orb within 3s after a 3-Ping can increase the DMG of next 6 Basic Attacks by 300%/<color=#FF3300FF>600%</color>/900%.

Name: Ultra: Thunder Wrath III
Description: Pining a Blue Orb within 3s after a 3-Ping can increase the DMG of next 6 Basic Attacks by 300%/600%/<color=#FF3300FF>900%</color>.

Name: Ultra: Infernal Tempest I
Description: After a Signature Move, Basic Attack DMG increases by <color=#FF3300FF>300%</color>/600%/900% for 10s.

Name: Ultra: Infernal Tempest II
Description: After a Signature Move, Basic Attack DMG increases by 300%/<color=#FF3300FF>600%</color>/900% for 10s.

Name: Ultra: Infernal Tempest III
Description: After a Signature Move, Basic Attack DMG increases by 300%/600%/<color=#FF3300FF>900%</color> for 10s.

Name: Ultra: Abyssal Gaze I
Description: For every 1 Orb pinged, CRIT Rate increases by <color=#FF3300FF>5%</color>/15%/25% for 6s, up to 4 stacks.

Name: Ultra: Abyssal Gaze II
Description: For every 1 Orb pinged, CRIT Rate increases by 5%/<color=#FF3300FF>15%</color>/25% for 6s, up to 4 stacks.

Name: Ultra: Abyssal Gaze III
Description: For every 1 Orb pinged, CRIT Rate increases by 5%/15%/<color=#FF3300FF>25%</color> for 6s, up to 4 stacks.

Name: Ultra: Nightcrow Down I
Description: Making 3-Ping twice within 5s can increase the damage of the next Signature Move by <color=#FF3300FF>300%</color>/600%/900%.

Name: Ultra: Nightcrow Down II
Description: Making 3-Ping twice within 5s can increase the DMG of the next Signature Move by 300%/<color=#FF3300FF>600%</color>/900%.

Name: Ultra: Nightcrow Down III
Description: Making 3-Ping twice within 5s can increase the DMG of the next Signature Move by 300%/600%/<color=#FF3300FF>900%</color>.

Name: Ultra: Tenebrion Core I
Description: After a Signature Move, DMG from pinging Orbs increases by <color=#FF3300FF>300%</color>/600%/900% for 10s.

Name: Ultra: Tenebrion Core II
Description: After a Signature Move, DMG from pinging Orbs increases by 300%/<color=#FF3300FF>600%</color>/900% for 10s.

Name: Ultra: Tenebrion Core III
Description: After a Signature Move, DMG from pinging Orbs increases by 300%/600%/<color=#FF3300FF>900%</color> for 10s.

Name: Signal Orb I
Description: <color=#FF3300FF>1</color>/2/3 random Signal Orb(s) drop after the enemy is defeated.

Name: Signal Orb II
Description: 1/<color=#FF3300FF>2</color>/3 random Signal Orb(s) drop after the enemy is defeated.

Name: Signal Orb III
Description: 1/2/<color=#FF3300FF>3</color> random Signal Orb(s) drop after the enemy is defeated.

Name: Signal Amplifier I
Description: Characters receive <color=#FF3300FF>1</color>/2/3 random Signal Orb(s) of the same color for every 10s they stay in battle.

Name: Signal Amplifier II
Description: Characters receive 1/<color=#FF3300FF>2</color>/3 random Signal Orb(s) of the same color for every 10s they stay in battle.

Name: Signal Amplifier III
Description: Characters receive 1/2/<color=#FF3300FF>3</color> random Signal Orb(s) of the same color for every 10s they stay in battle.

Name: Signal Optimization I
Description: Give <color=#FF3300FF>1</color>/2/3 random Signal Orb(s) each time when the character is deployed.

Name: Signal Optimization II
Description: Give 1/<color=#FF3300FF>2</color>/3 random Signal Orb(s) each time when the character is deployed.

Name: Signal Optimization III
Description: Give 1/2/<color=#FF3300FF>3</color> random Signal Orb(s) each time when the character is deployed.

Name: Signal Adaptation I
Description: Give <color=#FF3300FF>1</color>/2/3 random Signal Orb(s) when entering Matrix.

Name: Signal Adaptation II
Description: Give 1/<color=#FF3300FF>2</color>/3 random Signal Orb(s) when entering Matrix.

Name: Signal Adaptation III
Description: Give 1/2/<color=#FF3300FF>3</color> random Signal Orb(s) when entering Matrix.

Name: Energy Recycling I
Description: 3-Pings give <color=#FF3300FF>5</color>/10/15 extra Energy.

Name: Energy Recycling II
Description: 3-Pings give 5/<color=#FF3300FF>10</color>/15 extra Energy.

Name: Energy Recycling III
Description: 3-Pings give 5/10/<color=#FF3300FF>15</color> extra Energy.

Name: Energy Detection I
Description: Basic Attacks have a 20% chance to gain <color=#FF3300FF>2</color>/4/6 bonus Energy.

Name: Energy Detection II
Description: Basic Attacks have a 20% chance to gain 2/<color=#FF3300FF>4</color>/6 bonus Energy.

Name: Energy Detection III
Description: Basic Attacks have a 20% chance to gain 2/4/<color=#FF3300FF>6</color> bonus Energy.

Name: Instant Charging I
Description: Characters receive <color=#FF3300FF>10</color>/20/30 Energy for every 10s they stay in battle.

Name: Instant Charging II
Description: Characters receive 10/<color=#FF3300FF>20</color>/30 Energy for every 10s they stay in battle.

Name: Instant Charging III
Description: Characters receive 10/20/<color=#FF3300FF>30</color> Energy for every 10s they stay in battle.

Name: Energy Field I
Description: Give <color=#FF3300FF>5</color>/10/15 bonus Energy each time when the character is deployed.

Name: Energy Field II
Description: Give 5/<color=#FF3300FF>10</color>/15 bonus Energy each time when the character is deployed.

Name: Energy Field III
Description: Give 5/10/<color=#FF3300FF>15</color> bonus Energy each time when the character is deployed.

Name: Michael: Strike I
Description: Increases the Pet's power level by <color=#FF3300FF>50</color>/100/150.

Name: Michael: Strike II
Description: Increases the Pet's power level by 50/<color=#FF3300FF>100</color>/150.

Name: Michael: Strike III
Description: Increases the Pet's power level by 50/100/<color=#FF3300FF>150</color>.

Name: Michael: Quick Attack I
Description: Reduces the Pet's skill cooldown to <color=#FF3300FF>12</color>/8/4s.

Name: Michael: Quick Attack II
Description: Reduces the Pet's skill cooldown to 12/<color=#FF3300FF>8</color>/4s.

Name: Michael: Quick Attack III
Description: Reduces the Pet's skill cooldown to 12/8/<color=#FF3300FF>4</color>s.

Name: Michael: In-depth Study I
Description: Teach the Pet the Whirlwind skill.

Name: Michael: In-depth Study II
Description: Increases the number of Blade Wave from 1 to 3, and casting Whirlwind will automatically launch <color=#FF3300FF>20</color>/40 Blade Waves.

Name: Michael: In-depth Study III
Description: Increases the number of Blade Wave from 3 to 6, and casting Whirlwind will automatically launch 20/<color=#FF3300FF>40</color> Blade Waves.

Name: Michael: Radiation I
Description: Grants the Pet the Radiation skill that continuously damages nearby enemy units for <color=#FF3300FF>6%</color>/8%/10% of own ATK.

Name: Michael: Radiation II
Description: Grants the Pet the Radiation skill that continuously damages nearby enemy units for 6%/<color=#FF3300FF>8%</color>/10% of own ATK.

Name: Michael: Radiation III
Description: Grants the Pet the Radiation skill that continuously damages nearby enemy units for 6%/8%/<color=#FF3300FF>10%</color> of own ATK.

Name: Michael: Berserk I
Description: Increases the Pet's DMG by <color=#FF3300FF>20%</color>/30%/40% and attack frequency by <color=#FF3300FF>20%</color>/30%/40%.

Name: Michael: Berserk II
Description: Increases the Pet's DMG by 20%/<color=#FF3300FF>30%</color>/40% and attack frequency by 20%/<color=#FF3300FF>30%</color>/40%.

Name: Michael: Berserk III
Description: Increases the Pet's DMG by 20%/30%/<color=#FF3300FF>40%</color> and attack frequency by 20%/30%/<color=#FF3300FF>40%</color>.

Name: Michael: Black Hole I
Description: The Pet's Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger the Black Hole skill against enemies within <color=#FF3300FF>3</color>/5/7m.

Name: Michael: Black Hole II
Description: The Pet's Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger the Black Hole skill against enemies within 3/<color=#FF3300FF>5</color>/7m.

Name: Michael: Black Hole III
Description: The Pet's Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger the Black Hole skill against enemies within 3/5/<color=#FF3300FF>7</color>m.

Name: Shared Leadership I
Description: When team members are of 3 different classes, your character's max HP increases by <color=#FF3300FF>10%</color>/20%/30%.

Name: Shared Leadership II
Description: When team members are of 3 different classes, your character's max HP increases by 10%/<color=#FF3300FF>20%</color>/30%.

Name: Shared Leadership III
Description: When team members are of 3 different classes, your character's max HP increases by 10%/20%/<color=#FF3300FF>30%</color>.

Name: Shield I
Description: Gains a shield equal to <color=#FF3300FF>10%</color>/20%/30% HP at the start of battle.

Name: Shield II
Description: Gains a shield equal to 10%/<color=#FF3300FF>20%</color>/30% HP at the start of battle.

Name: Shield III
Description: Gains a shield equal to 10%/20%/<color=#FF3300FF>30%</color> HP at the start of battle.

Description: Members recover Dodge Gauge <color=#FF3300FF>20%</color>/35%/50% faster.

Name: Mobility Up II

Name: Mobility Up III

Name: Machine Learning I
Description: Limit of Dodge Gauge increases by <color=#FF3300FF>400</color>/700/1000.

Description: Limit of Dodge Gauge increases by 400/<color=#FF3300FF>700</color>/1000.

Name: Machine Learning III
Description: Limit of Dodge Gauge increases by 400/700/<color=#FF3300FF>1000</color>.

Name: Mobility Counterattack I
Description: Each dodge increases Movement Speed by 15% and all DMG dealt by <color=#FF3300FF>3%</color>/4%/5% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

Name: Mobility Counterattack II

Name: Mobility Counterattack III

Name: Overwhelming Power I
Description: Character ATK increases by <color=#FF3300FF>300</color>/600/900.

Name: Overwhelming Power II
Description: Character ATK increases by 300/<color=#FF3300FF>600</color>/900.

Name: Overwhelming Power III
Description: Character ATK increases by 300/600/<color=#FF3300FF>900</color>.

Name: Omnipotent I
Description: Character ATK increases by <color=#FF3300FF>50</color>/75/100 and DMG taken decreases by 15%.

Name: Omnipotent II
Description: Character ATK increases by 50/<color=#FF3300FF>75</color>/100 and DMG taken decreases by 15%.

Name: Omnipotent III
Description: Character ATK increases by 50/75/<color=#FF3300FF>100</color> and DMG taken decreases by 15%.

Name: Long Range Sniping I
Description: Attacks deal extra <color=#FF3300FF>400</color>/800/1200 Physical DMG on targets more than 4m away.

Name: Long Range Sniping II
Description: Attacks deal extra 400/<color=#FF3300FF>800</color>/1200 Physical DMG on targets more than 4m away.

Name: Desperation I
Description: Each time a Construct is defeated in battle, increases the Extra DMG Bonus of other Constructs by <color=#FF3300FF>10%</color>/20%/30%.

Name: Desperation II
Description: Each time a Construct is defeated in battle, increases the Extra DMG Bonus of other Constructs by 10%/<color=#FF3300FF>20%</color>/30%.

Name: Desperation III
Description: Each time a Construct is defeated in battle, increases the Extra DMG Bonus of other Constructs by 10%/20%/<color=#FF3300FF>30%</color>.

Name: Melee Assault I
